descriptionShort: Archimedes is a healthcare modeling and analytics organization: It applies quantitative analysis to healthcare, using the best available evidence from clinical trials, epidemiological studies, and other high quality sources to create models that can be used by heatlch care decision makers to understand how the different options they face affect clinical outcomes and costs.
